works.complaint:
We are employed by and authorised to represent Phil  
Cropper in relation to all risk services including internet defamation.


a.            The website states: “PHILLIP CROPPER, DARREN JANSEN, all scum
who pay people” “Have a look at their latest email scam campaign” “They  
even posted false testimonials on the website in that name. Cropper  
survived to scam thousands more people..” “Phillip the Scammer Cropper”
“Cropper survived to scam thousands more people..” “Phillip Cropper hangs  
around druggies, conmen like Peter Foster, bikies, crims, ex coppers and is  
a police informant. He has very few friends and always hires young girls  
and tries to drug them!!”
The site suggests that Phil Cropper is a scam company and is currently  
operating scams.

b.            Phil Cropper has never operated a scam. Phil Cropper has not
been charged, arrested, or convicted of any dishonesty offence. Phil  
Cropper would not be involved with any offences of this nature.

This content has been spread through numerous websites with the intention  
to defame my reputation.

c.             These comments are currently appearing on Google.com,
Google.com.au, and Google.co.nz. The comments harm my reputation and cause  
damage to my business.

Google.com.au: The publishers and distributors of this material would be  
liable for civil damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the  
possible retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims  
that in am engaged in criminal enterprises, this violates Criminal  
defamation sections of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).

Google.com: The content originating from the state of California is in  
violation of division 1 part 2 section 43 of the California Civil code.

Google.co.nz: These comments are in breach of the NZ Defamation Act 1992.
